meanings.definition: A cake containing dried fruit and nuts.
meanings.sent1: My grandma bakes delicious fruitcakes during the holidays.
meanings.sent2: I bought a fruitcake from the bakery for dessert.
meanings.sent3: The fruitcakes at the party disappeared in no time!
meanings.sent4: The fruitcake was a colorful mosaic of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the fruitcake filled the room with sweetness.

meanings.sent1: Some people think artists are like fruitcakes with their wild ideas.
meanings.sent2: He's a bit of a fruitcake, always coming up with strange theories.
meanings.sent3: The fruitcake in our office always has the quirkiest stories to tell.
meanings.sent4: She's a real fruitcake, marching to the beat of her own drum.
meanings.sent5: The town eccentric was known as the local fruitcake.
